A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film felt so long. An easy 30 minutes could have been trimmed from this and made the story MOVE\, you know\, like a Star Wars movie. My biggest gripe is that this film had SO MANY missed opportunities in the story-telling. I will not see it again till it is free on TV. By the way\, YES\, I have been a faithful Star Wars fan since May 25th\, 1977.
